Class modifyProductFormController

java.lang.Object
controller.modifyProductFormController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class modifyProductFormController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This class is the controller for the modifyProductForm.

    • onActionCancel

      public void onActionCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method returns the GUI to the main menu.

      event - fires when the cancel button is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read.

    • onActionSave

      public void onActionSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws java.io.IOException
      This method updates an index in the all products list if all of the checks are met.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the save button is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read.

    • onActionAdd

      public void onActionAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method adds a selected associated part to the associated parts list.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the add button is clicked.

    • onActionRemoveAssociatedPart

      public void onActionRemoveAssociatedPart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method removes an associated part from the associated part list.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the remove button is clicked.

    • onActionEnterParts

      public void onActionEnterParts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method updates the parts table to show the parts the user has searched for.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the enter key is hit when the search bar is selected.

    • switchViews

      public void switchViews​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event, java.lang.String fileLocation) throws java.io.IOException
      This method switches the view from the addPartForm to the specified file location.
      Parameters:
      event - fires when the cancel or save buttons are clicked and the proper conditions are met.
      fileLocation - What scene will be shown to the user.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - If the file is not read.

    • setText

      public void setText​(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> associatedParts, int index, Product product)
      This method is used to pass data between forms. It serves to load the text fields with the selected product's data and get the products associated parts.
      Parameters:
      index - The index of the part in allParts
      product - The selected part
      associatedParts - The product's associated Parts

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      This method implements from javafx.fxml.Initializable. Fills the rows of the part and associated parts tables.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The url
      rb - The resource bundle
